channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- Crestron TSW-X60 version prior to 2.001.0037.001 and MC3 version prior to 1.502.0047.001
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- Crestron TSW-X60 version prior to 2.001.0037.001 and MC3 version prior to 1.502.0047.001

item.title: CVE-2018-10630|2024-08-05T07:46:46.245Z -- ics-cert -- crestron%20tsw-x60%20version%20prior%20to%202.001.0037.001%20and%20mc3%20version%20prior%20to%201.502.0047.001
item.description: For Crestron TSW-X60 version prior to 2.001.0037.001 and MC3 version prior to 1.502.0047.001, The devices are shipped with authentication disabled, and there is no indication to users that they need to take steps to enable it. When compromised, the access to the CTP console is left open.
